					<item>
				<title>Games have left the shadow of the movie business</title>
				<link>http://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2016-05-13-games-have-left-the-shadow-of-the-movie-business</link>
				<description>Disney's cancellation of Infinity and move to a licensing model is just the latest move in a long, slow and inevitable divorce between games and movies.</description>
				<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 07:59:00 +0100</pubDate>
								<category>Publishing</category>
								<guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.gamesindustry.biz/guid/1830083</guid>
							</item>
